Manthys/Wespah/Darkfate/Scorpyo/Blacknighmare::


>        Gremlin took one shot in the leg, he slid to the side, 
avoiding the 
> others. In his raptor beast mode, he ran forward, claws extended, 
and lept 
> for Drillbit.

Darkfate shot his megablaster against Gremlin.
 
>        Jackles front tooth slide out of place. In return, he 
slipped a knife 
> from his belt and drove it for Drillbits neck.

Blacknighmare took one of her feathers and she stabbed her sharped 
feather in Jackles's back

 
>        Pheniox easily managed to avoid the clumsy shots by Dollen. 
Taking on 
> two opponents at once could bring any bot to the point of hysteria. 
She was 
> now grounded, and with a flame launcher in towe, sent a stream of 
fire at him.

Scorpyo shot his weapons against  Pheniox
 
>        Nighteyes, from the south of his, is hit in her shoulder 
once afian, 
> sending a chunk of her arm into the matrix. She cursed, and fired, 
now more 
> relentlessly, at Dollen.

Wespah and Manthys shot at Nighteyes
